title: How To | Smoky Eye Look
description:
What better accessory goes with a glam look than a classic smoky eye?

Step 1: Concentrate your darkest eye shadow color into your crease.

Step 2: Very lightly add a touch of highlighter to the highest point of your brow bone.

Step 3: Use a light silver shade all over the lid and blend it up to the crease.

Step 4: Using an angled brush pack the black eye shadow along your lower lash line and then blend the graphite and black together.

Step 5: For extra drama, line your upper and lower lash lines with black eyeliner. 

Step 6: Coat your lashes with a black mascara.


And there you have it, the perfect smoky eye. Follow our ‘How To’ series for more everyday tips!
